title: The Question Behind the Question

panel_structure.description: Evan plays solitaire with assumption cards while his reflection plays by wilder rules. Cards show comfortable questions floating between real and reflection. The mirror game reveals the safety of his inquiry.

Cards scatter revealing deeper game board. Evan reaches for a dangerous glowing wild card labeled 'The Real Question.' Past selves fade in background, all playing safe games. The Architect becomes the wild card itself.
panel_structure.focus: Choosing dangerous truth over comfortable questioning

transformation_notes: The scene transforms philosophical inquiry itself, revealing how our deepest questions often protect us from even deeper ones. The solitaire metaphor perfectly captures intellectual comfort zones.

color_palette.primary: comfort blue shifting to danger amber
color_palette.secondary: safe green dissolving to wild card gold

dialogue_rhythm: From mechanical comfort to vertiginous insight
narrator_role: Guide through the destruction of safe questioning
